text: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].
translation.id.indonesian: Dan mereka adakan (hubungan) nasab antara Allah dan antara jin. Dan sesungguhnya jin mengetahui bahwa mereka benar-benar akan diseret (ke neraka),
